mdRecord.dcterms:description: First row (l to r): Brian King, Paul Roy Yoder, John Rees Dunn, John Anthony Thomas, Donald Barry Nolan, Charles Henry Emerson, Robert Lindsay Burger, Robert Stanley Brown, Washington Carlyle Winn, Richard Thomas Edwards, III, Edgar Lambert Allport, David Michael Murphy, Joseph Franklin Smiddy. Second row (l to r): Edward Blease Eadie, Jr., John Carl Spivey, Jr., James Sidney Smith, Harold Prebble Settle, Jr., Roy Winston Lutz, Gordon Boyd Newell, Terrence Michael Murphy, Bonnie Louis Reshefsky, Bruce McKinley Birch, Charles Arthur Whelan, Norman Louis Burak, William Joseph Kagey, George Phillip Hillen, III, Robert Ray Henderson, Omer Lee Jeter, Jr. Third row (l to r): Charles Samuel Betts, III, Vivian Winoma Pinn, Rick Allen Moore, RIchard Titus D'Alonzo, Walter Lee King, William Wood Gough, Kenneth Edward Greer, Jeffrey Philip Robbins, Thomas Linwood Perry, William Keath May, Thomas Eugene Boschen, Edward Gerald Abramson, Robert Eugene Searle, Allen Martin Glasgow. Fourth row (l to r): Warden Hamlin Emory, Gordon Humphreys Smith, William Emory Cooley, Jr., Louis Sutherland Allen, Jr., William Grier Kepler, Gary Calvert Jobin, James Ellis Dill, David William Scott, III, Macdonald Dick, II, John Brantley Sydnor, Richard Hoppe Briggs, John Markle Costenbader, Douglas Stephen Rowe, George Z. Seiters. Fifth row (l to r): Igor Magier, Samuel Morgenstern LeBauer, Ernest Perry Buxton, III, Bryan Tighe Woods, John Lewis Starling, Henry Claiborne Hawthorne, Jr., Thad Leroy Jones, George William Booze, David Rinser Bickers.
